name: Shape of the Night
description: The 9-second long animated horror film. Part of the Death Fairy Tales loops series. Digital cutout animation by Kajetan Obarski (Kiszkiloszki); 2021; silent; mp4; 1080px1080px. The Death Fairy character was created in 2015 and went viral all around the www. This episode of DFT is based on one of the very first animations from the series and was freshly reanimated.
